name: Project: Hush
description: Hush is a first person horror survival game based around evading and escaping from active enemies, using sound and items to manipulate where you want them to be, much like Alien: Isolation. This is a current WIP, and i will continue to work on upgrades, improvement, and bug fixes as long as the support allows it. Thank you for checking out Hush, and i hope to hear your feedback soon!
